TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Image extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

span.span: Displays an image on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件使你可以使用服务器代码中的图像。The control lets you work with images from server code. 使用 控件显示网页上请求浏览器支持的任何有效图像。Use the control to display any valid image supported by the requesting browser on the Web page. 通过设置属性来指定所显示图像的路径 。The path to the displayed image is specified by setting the property. 可以通过设置属性，指定在图像不可用时要显示的文本 。You can specify the text to display in place of image when the image is not available by setting the property. 图像相对于网页上其他元素的对齐方式通过设置属性来指定 。The alignment of the image in relation to other elements on the Web page is specified by setting property. > [!NOTE] > 此控件只显示图像。This control only displays an image. 如果需要捕获图像上的鼠标单击，请使用 控件。If you need to capture mouse clicks on the image, use the control. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在网页上创建控件。The following example demonstrates how to create an control on a Web page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 图像 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: Image Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置当图像不可用时， 控件中显示的替换文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed in the control when the image is unavailable.

summary.span: 支持工具提示功能的浏览器将此文本显示为工具提示。

span.span: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature display this text as a ToolTip.

value.span: 当图像不可用时， 控件中显示的替换文本。

span.span: The alternate text displayed in the control when the image is unavailable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定在属性中指定的图像不可用时要显示的文本 。Use this property to specify the text to display if the image specified in the property is not available. 在支持工具提示功能的浏览器中，此文本还显示为工具提示。In browsers that support the ToolTips feature, this text also displays as a ToolTip. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定图像不可用时要为图像显示的替换文字。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text to display for the image when the image is not available. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

member this.DescriptionUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置图像详细说明的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location to a detailed description for the image.

value.span: 包含图像详细说明的文件的 URL。

span.span: The URL for the file that contains a detailed description for the image.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定为图像提供其他详细信息的 HTML 文件。The property specifies an HTML file that provides additional details for the image. 属性呈现为 `longdesc` 图像控件的特性。The property renders as the `longdesc` attribute for the image control. 如果 未设置该属性，或者将其设置为空字符串 ( "" ) ，则 控件在呈现时不包含 `longdesc` 特性。If the property is not set, or is set to an empty string (""), the control renders without the `longdesc` attribute. 使用 属性来补充 属性。Use the property to supplement the property. 例如，如果使用 控件显示阳历系统的图像，则可以将 属性设置为， `The Solar System,` 然后将 属性设置为 HTML 页面，此页面进一步描述了太阳系轨道太阳在太阳系中的图像。For example, if you use an control to display an image of the solar system, you can set the property to `The Solar System,` and then set the property to an HTML page that further describes the image of planets orbiting the sun in the solar system. 属性是可选的，但它可以为仅限文本的浏览器和屏幕阅读器增强网页的可访问性。The property is optional, but it can enhance the accessibility of your Web page for text-only browsers and screen readers. 浏览器可以使用详细的文本说明来传达重要的概念，而不是直观的图像。Browsers can use the detailed text description to convey important concepts in place of, or in addition to, the visual image. 请参阅浏览器文档，了解有关如何使用特性指定的描述性内容的详细信息 `longdesc` 。Refer to your browser documentation for details on how it uses the descriptive content specified by the `longdesc` attribute.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否生成空字符串值的替换文字特性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control generates an alternate text attribute for an empty string value.

value.span: 如果控件生成空字符串值的替换文字特性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control generates the alternate text attribute for an empty string value; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当 未设置属性时， 控件不包含 `alt` 特性来指定控件呈现中的替换文本。By default, when the property is not set, the control does not include the `alt` attribute to specify the alternate text in the control rendering. 将 属性设置为 `true` ，以便始终在呈现的输出中包括该控件的替换文本特性 。Set the property to `true` to always include the alternate text attribute in rendered output for the control. XHTML 文档类型定义需要 `alt` 图像控件上的属性。The XHTML document type definition requires the `alt` attribute on image controls. 不过，辅助功能最佳做法建议，不应指定属性的图像控件不会传达与网页上下文相关的信息 `alt` 。However, accessibility best practices recommend that image controls that do not convey information relevant to the context of the Web page should not specify an `alt` attribute. 可以通过将属性设置为来满足 XHTML 和辅助功能要求 `true` 。You can meet both XHTML and accessibility requirements by setting the property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageAlign ImageAlign { get; set; }

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件相对于网页上其他元素的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定图像相对于网页上其他元素的对齐方式。Use the property to specify or determine the alignment of the image in relation to other elements on the Web page. 下表列出了可能的对齐方式。The following table lists the possible alignments. |对齐方式Alignment|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设定对齐方式。The alignment is not set.| |`Left`|图像沿网页的左边缘对齐，文字在图像右边换行。The image is aligned on the left edge of the Web page with text wrapping on the right.| |`Right`|图像沿网页的右边缘对齐，文字在图像左边换行。The image is aligned on the right edge of the Web page with text wrapping on the left.| |`Baseline`|图像的下边缘与第一行文本的下边缘对齐。The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`Top`|图像的上边缘与同一行上最高元素的上边缘对齐。The upper edge of the image is aligned with the upper edge of the highest element on the same line.| |`Middle`|图像的中间与第一行文本的下边缘对齐。The middle of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`Bottom`|图像的下边缘与第一行文本的下边缘对齐。The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`AbsBottom`|图像的下边缘与同一行中最大元素的下边缘对齐。The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the largest element on the same line.| |`AbsMiddle`|图像的中间与同一行中最大元素的中间对齐。The middle of the image is aligned with the middle of the largest element on the same line.| |`TextTop`|图像的上边缘与同一行上最高文本的上边缘对齐。The upper edge of the image is aligned with the upper edge of the highest text on the same line.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指定 控件相对于网页上其他元素的对齐方式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ImageUrl { get; set; }

member this.ImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为要在 控件中显示的图像提供路径的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL that provides the path to an image to display in the control.

value.span: 为要在 控件中显示的图像提供路径的 URL。

span.span: The URL that provides the path to an image to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要在控件中显示的图像的 URL 。Use the property to specify the URL of an image to display in the control. 您可以使用相对或绝对 URL。You can use a relative or an absolute URL. 相对 URL 将图像的位置与网页的位置相关联，而无需在服务器上指定完整路径。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server. 路径相对于网页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这样就可以更轻松地将整个站点移动到服务器上的另一个目录中，而无需更新代码。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the code. 绝对 URL 提供完整路径，因此，将该站点移动到另一个目录需要更新代码。An absolute URL provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires that you update the code. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定要在控件中显示的图像的位置 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the location of the image to display in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is primarily used by control developers. 控件实现 方法以跳过呈现任何子控件。The control implements the method to skip rendering of any child controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便某些文本始终显示在之后 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that some text is always displayed after the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomImageRenderContents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/CS/custom_image_rendercontentscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomImageRenderContents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/VB/custom_image_rendercontentsvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomImageRenderContents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/CS/custom_image_rendercontents.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomImageRenderContents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/VB/custom_image_rendercontents.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于 4.0，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .
